messages.sameNumberOptions: You must set the same number of options

tooltips.dropdown: Do not use the dropdown if there are more than 300 options in the list.

exceptions.attributeEntityMustBeSameAsInCompositeAt: Attribute Entity must be same as in Composite Attribute
exceptions.attributeNotBelongToEntity: Attribute does not belong to this Entity.
exceptions.fileTypeCannotBeDeleted: The record cannot be deleted as it is used in the Attribute '%s'.
exceptions.maxLessThanMin: Min should be less than Max.
exceptions.noAttributeConverterFound: Attribute converting from type '%s' to '%s' is impossible.
exceptions.attributeValueIsInUse: Attribute value is in use and can not be deleted.
exceptions.attributeWithSuchCodeAlreadyExist: Attribute with such code already exist.
exceptions.attributeIsUsedInProducts: Attribute is used in products. Please, update products first.
exceptions.attributeIsUsedInClassifications: Attribute is used in classifications. Please, update classifications first.
exceptions.someAttributeDontMathToPattern: Some attribute don't match to pattern.
